ing: 3 tablespoons white sugar, or more to taste
2 tablespoons lemon juice, or more to taste
1/2 (1 liter) bottle lime-flavored carbonated water (such as PerrierÂ®)
des: "This is a recipe I made in my spare time one day. I swear it tastes just like SpriteÂ® but without the extra chemicals."
ins: Combine sugar and lemon juice in a glass. Pour in the carbonated water slowly. Stir mixture until well combined.
